description: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Tendering Procedures: Suppliers on permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No Nature of Requirements: Jetty Electrical BIO This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number EB144-230103/A dated with a closing of August 23, 2022 at 2:00 pm ADT. ...
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

**Project Title**: Jetty Electrical Service
**Reference Number**: PW-_PWA-504-6268
**Solicitation #:** EB144-230103/B

**Publication Date**: September 1, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: October 4, 2022 (13:00:00)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
**Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

**Tender Description**
---------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), seeks a qualified Design Firm to establish a new electrical service for the Marina and Jetty at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography in Dartmouth, NS. The electrical service is to be located in a separate electrical building, upgrading and rearranging existing site services and shore power as required.

We invite the following twenty-one prequalified firms to participate in this Request for Proposal (RFP):
1. Fundy Engineering & Consulting
2. M&R Engineering Limited
3. CBCL Limited
4. Eastpoint Engineering Limited
5. Peerless Consulting Ltd.
6. R.A. Smith & Assoc. Limited
7. SNC-Lavalin Inc.
8. RSEI Consultants Ltd.
9. exp Services Inc.
10. Tweedie & Associates Consulting
11. Argyll Associates Limited
12. Wood Canada Limited (formerly AMEC)
13. AECOM Canada Ltd.
14. Dumac Energy Limited
15. MCW Maricor
16. WSP Canada Inc.
17. EA Engineering
18. HDK Consulting
19. Strum Engineering Associates Ltd
20. Roy Consultants
21. Dillon Consulting Limited

**Proposal Instructions**
-------------------------

To submit a proposal, please use the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. Failing this, please use the email address specified below only to open an epost Connect conversation or send proposals through an epost Connect message. The proposer must verify their login details and availability for their epost Connect account.

Submissions should be sent to:
Bid Receiving
Public Works and Government Services Canada
1713 Bedford Row
Halifax, NS B3J 1T3
ePost Connect: TPSGC.RAReceptionSoumissionsNE-ARBidReceivingNS.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please note that submissions sent directly to this email address will not be accepted.
